hotel_address: Via XX Settembre, 80, 50121 Firenze FI, Italy
hotel_description: Experience the grandeur of Florence at Villa Medici, a luxurious 5-star hotel nestled in the heart of the city. With its opulent rooms and suites adorned with Renaissance-inspired decor, you'll feel like royalty as you immerse yourself in the city's rich history. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Duomo and the Arno River from your private balcony. Indulge in exquisite Italian cuisine at our Michelin-starred restaurant, or unwind with a glass of Chianti in our elegant lounge. Perfect for discerning travelers seeking an unforgettable experience in the cradle of the Renaissance.
nearest_attractions: Located just a short stroll from the Uffizi Gallery, the Ponte Vecchio, and the Palazzo Pitti, Villa Medici offers easy access to Florence's most iconic landmarks. Explore the charming streets of the Oltrarno district, renowned for its artisan workshops and leather goods. Take a leisurely walk along the Arno River and enjoy the picturesque views of the city. Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Florence with its world-class museums, art galleries, and historic churches.
